verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> unto Aaron וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him בְּהַעֲלֹֽתְךָ֙ <WH5927> unto him When thou lightest אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּרֹ֔ת <WH5216> the lamps אֶל־ <WH413> about מוּל֙ <WH4136> against פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the front הַמְּנוֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> the candlestick יָאִ֖ירוּ <WH215> shall give light שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> the seven הַנֵּרֽוֹת׃ <WH5216> lamps

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did כֵּן֙ <WH3651> so אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> about מוּל֙ <WH4136> against פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the front הַמְּנוֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> the candlestick הֶעֱלָ֖ה <WH5927> so he lighted נֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5216> the lamps כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וְזֶ֨ה <WH2088> now this מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> And this work הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <WH4501> of the candlestick מִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH4749> [was of] beaten זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> gold עַד־ <WH5704> against יְרֵכָ֥הּ <WH3409> unto the shaft עַד־ <WH5704> to its פִּרְחָ֖הּ <WH6525> thereof unto the flowers מִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH4749> thereof [was] beaten work הִ֑וא <WH1931> he כַּמַּרְאֶ֗ה <WH4758> according unto the pattern אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֶרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> had shewed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> so he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃ <WH4501> the candlestick פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַ֚ח <WH3947> Take אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְטִהַרְתָּ֖ <WH2891> and cleanse אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְכֹֽה־ <WH3541> Thus תַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> And thus shalt thou do לָהֶם֙ לְטַֽהֲרָ֔ם <WH2891> unto them to cleanse הַזֵּ֥ה <WH5137> them Sprinkle עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֵ֣י <WH4325> water חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> of purifying וְהֶעֱבִ֤ירוּ <WH5674> use תַ֙עַר֙ <WH8593> A razor עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> their whole בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> all their flesh וְכִבְּס֥וּ <WH3526> and let them wash בִגְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH899> their clothes וְהִטֶּהָֽרוּ׃ <WH2891> and [so] make themselves clean

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> Then let them take פַּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> bull וּמִנְחָת֔וֹ <WH4503> with his meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> [even] fine flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil וּפַר־ <WH6499> bullock שֵׁנִ֥י <WH8145> and another בֶן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> bull תִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> shalt thou take לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> for a sin offering

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <WH7126> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהִ֨קְהַלְתָּ֔ <WH6950> together אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֖ת <WH5712> the whole assembly בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <WH7126> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> the Levites לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְסָמְכ֧וּ <WH5564> shall put בְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> upon the Levites

וְהֵנִיף֩ <WH5130> shall offer אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֤ם <WH3881> the Levites תְּנוּפָה֙ <WH8573> [for] an offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהָי֕וּ <WH1961> may qualify לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> that they may execute אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> the service יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> And the Levites יִסְמְכ֣וּ <WH5564> shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> their hands עַ֖ל <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the heads הַפָּרִ֑ים <WH6499> of the bullocks וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <WH6213> and thou shalt offer אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶחָ֨ד <WH259> the one חַטָּ֜את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶחָ֤ד <WH259> and the other עֹלָה֙ <WH5930> [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> for the Levites

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתָּ֙ <WH5975> And thou shalt set אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> and before בָנָ֑יו <WH1121> his sons וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <WH5130> and offer אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> them [for] an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהִבְדַּלְתָּ֙ <WH914> Thus shalt thou separate אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> become לִ֖י הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> and the Levites

וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And after כֵן֙ <WH3651> after that יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> go in הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> that shall the Levites לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> to do the service אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְטִֽהַרְתָּ֣ <WH2891> and thou shalt cleanse אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <WH5130> them and offer אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> תְּנוּפָֽה׃ <WH8573> them [for] an offering

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for נְתֻנִ֨ים <WH5414> For they [are] wholly given נְתֻנִ֥ים <WH5414> given הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> like לִ֔י מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> unto me from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel תַּחַת֩ <WH8478> instead פִּטְרַ֨ת <WH6363> instead of such as open כָּל־ <WH3605> of every רֶ֜חֶם <WH7358> every womb בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> [even instead of] the firstborn כֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לָקַ֥חְתִּי <WH3947> have I taken אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לִֽי׃

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לִ֤י כָל־ <WH3605> every בְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> For all the firstborn בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> [are] mine [both] man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and beast בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> on the day הַכֹּתִ֤י <WH5221> that I smote כָל־ <WH3605> all בְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> every firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <WH6942> I sanctified אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לִֽי׃

וָאֶקַּח֙ <WH3947> And I have taken אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> instead כָּל־ <WH3605> of every בְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> for all the firstborn בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וָאֶתְּנָ֨ה <WH5414> And I have given אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> the Levites נְתֻנִ֣ים ׀ <WH5414> [as] a gift לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> to Aaron וּלְבָנָ֗יו <WH1121> and to his sons מִתּוֹךְ֮ <WH8432> from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲבֹ֞ד <WH5647> to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֤ת <WH5656> the service בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּלְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> and to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> behalf בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> become בִּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel נֶ֔גֶף <WH5063> that there be no plague בְּגֶ֥שֶׁת <WH5066> come nigh בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> unto the sanctuary

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> did מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> and Aaron וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> and all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> to the Levites כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> according unto all that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> concerning the Levites כֵּן־ <WH3651> so עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> so did לָהֶ֖ם בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּֽתְחַטְּא֣וּ <WH2398> were purified הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> And the Levites וַֽיְכַבְּסוּ֙ <WH3526> and they washed בִּגְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH899> their clothes וַיָּ֨נֶף <WH5130> offered אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> and Aaron אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> them [as] an offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיְכַפֵּ֧ר <WH3722> made an atonement עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron לְטַהֲרָֽם׃ <WH2891> for them to cleanse

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And after כֵ֞ן <WH3651> so בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> that went הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> the Levites לַעֲבֹ֤ד <WH5647> in to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹֽדָתָם֙ <WH5656> their service בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> and before בָנָ֑יו <WH1121> his sons כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> concerning the Levites כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> so did לָהֶֽם׃ ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is what לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> This [is it] that [belongeth] unto the Levites מִבֶּן֩ <WH1121> old חָמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> and five וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward יָבוֹא֙ <WH935> they shall go in לִצְבֹ֣א <WH6633> to perform צָבָ֔א <WH6635> service בַּעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> upon the service אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וּמִבֶּן֙ <WH1121> And from the age חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> of fifty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> they shall cease מִצְּבָ֣א <WH6635> waiting הָעֲבֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> upon the service וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not יַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> [thereof] and shall serve עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> any

וְשֵׁרֵ֨ת <WH8334> But shall minister אֶת־ <WH854> for אֶחָ֜יו <WH251> with their brethren בְּאֹ֤הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation לִשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> to keep מִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <WH4931> the charge וַעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no service לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> and shall do כָּ֛כָה <WH3602> Thus תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> Thus shalt thou do לַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> unto the Levites בְּמִשְׁמְרֹתָֽם׃ <WH4931> touching their charge פ
